name: Productos Mas Vendidos Con Existencia
query:
select
IFNULL(b.item_code, 'TOTAL') as "Clave:Link/Item:120",
c.brand as "Marca",
SUM(b.qty) as "Cantidad:Float:140", 
SUM(b.amount) as "Importe Ventas", 
SUM(@ImporteCosto := (c.valuation_rate)*(b.qty)) as "Importe Costo:Float:140",
SUM(@Utilidad := (b.amount)-(@ImporteCosto)) AS "Utilidad:Float:140",
AVG(@Porcentaje := TRUNCATE ((@Utilidad * 100 /(b.amount)/ 1), 0)) AS "Porcentaje:Float:140",
case when a.actual_qty is null then 0 else a.actual_qty end as "Existencia Qty:Float:140"
from
`tabSales Invoice Item` b left join
`tabItem` c on b.item_code = c.item_code left join
`tabSales Invoice` d on b.parent = d.name left join
`tabBin` a on c.item_code = a.item_code
where d.posting_date >= %(from_date)s and d.posting_date <= %(to_date)s and b.docstatus = 1
GROUP BY b.item_code desc
